summary: I RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE MONTHS AGO TO HAVE THE LEFT HAND BALL JOINT REPLACED. I CONTACTED THE LOCAL DEALER SEVERAL TIMES (ELKO MOTOR COMPANY ELKO, NEVADA) AND THEY ARE TELLING ME THEY ARE NOT GETTING THE PARTS FROM THE FACTORY.  I BELIEVE THE DEALER.  I AM CONCERNED ABOUT WHAT COULD HAPPEN PULLING MY 42' TOY HAULER IF THIS FAILS.  *TT
